Who am I?

My name is Cary de Silva and I'm a DSA grade 5 driving instructor (that's pretty good) with 7+ years experience teaching people to drive, and I'm the owner of Genesis Driving School.

I try to make my driving lessons as relaxed and friendly as possible and that seems to work, as I've managed to achieve very high pass rates. I always try to be as flexible as possible with lesson times and pick-ups and I can probably work around your busy schedule.

If you have any questions, or would like to have an informal chat, please do get in touch.

In the meantime, see what some of my students thought about their driving lessons!

Areas.

Genesis Driving School can provide driving lessons in Warlingham, Hamsey Green, Selsdon, Kenley, Caterham, Purley, South Croydon, Wallington, Carshalton, Sutton, Belmont and Banstead.
